participant_1.name: Mia Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative, optimistic, and sociable. She loves to engage with others and share her interests.
participant_1.background: My collection of vinyl records is my pride and joy. My dog is called Alfred. I am not married, but I love planning weddings. I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time. I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around.

participant_2.name: Jake Anderson
participant_2.personality: Passionate, resilient, and introspective. He has a deep love for music and expresses his emotions through songwriting.
participant_2.background: I lost my mom when I was a child. I cannot get enough of Lindsey Stirling's music. I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents. I'd brag about my famous stews that are always a hit at parties. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
Great! I'm so excited to have a weekend without any kids around.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could say the same.
What are you up to this weekend?
I'm going to be working on my music.
Oh, that's cool. What kind of music do you like to make?
I'm a singer/songwriter. I mostly write and perform country music.
That's awesome! I love country music.
Do you have any upcoming shows?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to play some gigs in the near future.
That would be awesome. I'd love to come see you perform.
Thanks! I'll let you know if anything comes up.
